coffeeDrinks.description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans.
An espresso-based coffee drink that is typically composed of equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.
A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a small layer of milk foam.
A coffee drink prepared by diluting espresso with hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from, brewed coffee.
An espresso-based coffee drink with a small amount of milk, typically foamed milk, added.
A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte, made with espresso, steamed milk, chocolate syrup, and topped with whipped cream.
A coffee-based dessert made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream or gelato.
A method of brewing coffee where finely ground coffee is boiled in a pot, often with sugar, and served unfiltered.
A coffee brewing device that uses a plunger to press coarse-ground coffee to the bottom of a cylindrical container after steeping, producing a full-bodied flavor.
A manual brewing method that involves pouring hot water over coffee grounds in a filter, allowing the brewed coffee to drip into a vessel.
A coffee preparation method where coffee grounds are steeped in cold water for an extended period, resulting in a smooth and less acidic flavor.
Cold brew coffee infused with nitrogen gas, creating a creamy and foamy texture with a rich flavor.
A cocktail consisting of hot coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and topped with whipped cream.
A traditional coffee drink made by adding whipped cream and sometimes chocolate shavings to a cup of black coffee.
An espresso-based coffee drink similar to a latte but with a higher proportion of coffee to milk and a microfoam texture.
A foam-covered iced coffee drink made by mixing instant coffee, sugar, water, and optionally milk in a shaker or blender.
An espresso-based coffee drink made with a double shot of espresso.
An espresso-based coffee drink made with equal parts espresso and steamed milk, often served in a small glass.

coffeeMaker.name: Espresso Machine
coffeeMaker.description: A powerful espresso machine for brewing rich and flavorful coffee.

coffeeMaker.name: Drip Coffee Maker
coffeeMaker.description: A convenient drip coffee maker for easy and quick coffee brewing.

coffeeMaker.name: French Press
coffeeMaker.description: A classic French press for those who prefer a bold and robust coffee taste.

coffeeMaker.name: Single-Serve Coffee Maker
coffeeMaker.description: A compact single-serve coffee maker for on-the-go coffee enthusiasts.

coffeeMaker.name: Pour Over Coffee Maker
coffeeMaker.description: A manual pour over coffee maker for precision brewing and full extraction.

coffeeMaker.name: Cold Brew Coffee Maker
coffeeMaker.description: A specialized cold brew coffee maker for smooth and refreshing cold brews.

coffeeMaker.name: Automatic Espresso Machine
coffeeMaker.description: An automated espresso machine that delivers cafe-quality drinks with ease.

coffeeMaker.name: Siphon Coffee Maker
coffeeMaker.description: A unique siphon coffee maker that uses a vacuum process for brewing.

coffeeMaker.name: Pod Coffee Machine
coffeeMaker.description: A pod-based coffee machine for quick and hassle-free coffee preparation.

coffeeMaker.name: Turkish Coffee Maker
coffeeMaker.description: A traditional Turkish coffee maker for preparing strong and aromatic Turkish coffee.

coffeeMaker.name: Moka Pot
coffeeMaker.description: A classic stovetop espresso maker that produces rich and intense coffee flavors.

coffeeMaker.name: AeroPress
coffeeMaker.description: A versatile and portable coffee maker for brewing a wide range of coffee styles.
